urls.title: The Box SF (@theboxsfmercantile) • Instagram photo
urls.description: The Box SF shared a post on Instagram: "What a great Thanksgiving and picking trip to Missouri, Kansas, Iowa and Nebraska! And the @chiefs #won 🎉 I was up at 4am to fly @united back to San Francisco, now it's time for my pillows! 😴💤😴". Follow their account to see 964 posts.

data.text: What a great Thanksgiving and picking trip to Missouri, Kansas, Iowa and Nebraska! And the @chiefs #won 🎉 I was up at 4am to fly @united back to San Francisco, now it's time for my pillows! 😴💤😴 https://t.co/hSBtJtfS3q

data.text: @airvistara @united @airvistara I reached out to BBI Vistara and they are waiting for united airlines to tell them what to do with the bag. Again let me clear: I want the bag to be delivered to my address. I am here for vacation and can't travel to far airports because of the airline's fault

data.text: This is the 3rd @united CRJ of my trip and also, the 3rd plane to have a delayed departure due to a maintenance issue.
